content: Exactly as I remember. :-) Also very rewarding to discover that as an adult I can finally solve all the puzzles which I only cheated through as a kid!
Slow ponderous game. Beautiful, exotic, both sounds and sights.
Riven is still the bee's knees! After all these years...
I live this game. I used to play this and myst on my computer!
Miserable, bunch of photos pretending to be video game.
Great game! Feels great to finally beat it

Trying to decide if this a 1 star or 5 star. The game itself is fantastic, the visuals are stunning and the puzzles challenging. Sadly, I can't finish the game. I am 90% there, but I cannot make the marble machine in the main dome function. This may be a screen size issue (using a Pixel 4), since I had issues opening the Shark elevator and adding a pellet to the frog trap. Basically anywhere with small touch area. Sad, because I was pleased with my progress.
Absolute junk. Can't play it because plays like my screen isnt big enough. I cannot interact with any the edges of the screen. No replay came when I asked about it.
the graphics kill any enjoyment for me.... way to grainy to really tell much of anything
Looks exactly how i remember it. Thank you for bringing this to android. I will download again ‚ù§üåà

Not bad! Have played this on the computer back in the late 90s. Oh the nostalgia! I'm glad I can now play it on my mobile device. All the graphics, sounds, music and gameplay are just like the computer version. A few improvements can be made, like some of the sounds don't play in full, I'm guessing because that would take more GB, the ripples in the water could move like the PC version, etc. However, I played it to the very end, pleased to see it's just like the PC version.
Stuck Installing at 99%. Can't even play the game.
Every time I open the game it closes!

Game is fantastic, as expected. Played it as a kid in the 90's and early 2000's on PC. One problem though... On a mobile phone, the text in the journals and notes are very small and read difficult. Especially Catherine's journal. Game is definitely not for someone with eye sight problems. Luckily I'm still OK.
It and Myst are simply the best classical games. Thank you for bringing them back.
Great game.

First played this on its release on ps one, now I get to play it on my tablet as well. Great for long haul flights and whiling away the hours,I recommend a notebook for noting things down but then at my age a notebook is a godsend ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Won't open
The game is flawless up to the marble. Absolutely brilliant until that point. The marble simply will not be set down in the tray.

I played this in the nineties and was captivated - pleased to see it now available on Android. Looks the same as I remember, without having to change the CDs all the time. Unfortunately there's a problem with the marble puzzle. I know I've got the solution right - I've double checked it and also verified online. However on pulling down the lever then pressing the light, nothing happens - so I can't continue. Very disappointing.
It is really bad take that Andrew mccann

Works just as well as the full game did on PC originally, a few things are a tiny but harder to spot but mostly great. Only a few minor issues - couldn't hold a pellet and drop it to catch the frog in a trap, and some sound overlap issues towards the end
One of my favourite games of all time. Played again during Covid19, even better than I remember it from the 90s...
Amazing Graphics/Sound/Story !
Stuck at title screen. Got refunded. Super bummed since I love the series...

Game resized on activation and never left the title screen. nothing in download or description indicated that it may not work on my brand new chrome book. I would like my money back as this game is unplayable.
Softlocks after intro.
Animations are cut a lot to save space, but for the most part, it's freaking RIVEN!

I played Riven on a laptop when it first came out years ago. This android phone version is an exact replica! There are absolutely no bugs, all controls work perfectly, the graphics and resolution are perfect and outstanding, and I had no problems completing each puzzle and linking to all Ages. I was able to complete the game without any issues, and I was able to end the game multiple ways, just like the original game. The programmers did an outstanding job of recreating this game. Thank you !!!
I couldnt get it to install
Much more challenging than Myst. Keep a pad and pencil close by. Be ready to do some work on this one.

The spinning dome puzzles the sliders are very difficult to move. I keep grabing the wrong one and the bigger dome with the color marbles I can't see in front of my finger where to place them correctly without making a mistake. Please fix

Perfect nostalgia game. But, just as with Noodlecake's Realmyst, an old adjustment you make is reset near the end of the game--suddenly, you can't go around by linking through other books, and you can't go through because your pathway has been reset! At least with Realmyst you could skip the second page in one age and still finish the game: I can't finish this game.
Wouldn't even launch, was hoping to play where I'd left off on my pc, don't buy it's complete rubbish
Excellent adaptation to Android play some audio glitches but still sounds great as is. Would like to have access to the rest of Myst series for Android as well.
I remember playing this when it first came out.

The developer chose not to use the Play Store large file support, and the game doesn't use external SD cards. Missing water ripple effects and many subtle background animations (bugs, birds). Background audio loops have jarring skips and audio does not smoothly fade between scenes. The "video skip" button annoyingly appears even for very short videos. Persistent crashes prevent certain maglev trips (forest to puzzle island). This game deserves a better port - this one amounts to phoning it in.
Great classic game. Horrendous bugs with this port
I would like a refund as the controls didn't work. Or, when the game would eventually respond, it would be jerky and low resolution. The first was a visual gem, this does not meet that standard.

Extremely boring and annoying. Even if you don't pay attention to the multiple bugs and 2d world and worse controls still the game is terribly bad. Waste space with only few puzzles, and even there in hundreds of miles of space multiple objects and pathways are hidden! Pathetic game, the worst I've ever played
At the current time while on Android 10, this app is completely unplayable for me. I have uninstalled and reinstalled twice to troubleshoot, but the app continually crashes at startup. Unusable.
I love this game, but the next one in the series is my favorite
Promises a lot,delivers very little. Game locks up frequently and player movement is very slow. Tried for a refund but it wouldn't go thru, apparently Google doesn't do refunds.
Won't download, so had a refund. Uninstalled most apps to make room to, won't get the data back for them. Not happy
Amazing!

Gameplay is exactly like the original PC Riven (click forward or back). Unfortunately, you cannot play it to the end. I kept getting glitches returning to Temple Island, the Fire Marble puzzle, and then linking to Prison Island. I'm disappointed I can't finish it. :(
Gameplay is the same as the old myst on PC and after playing the realMyst on android, I can no longer play with this kind of old school gameplay. Too bad!
About the same but had to project to bigger monitor

I wish you could have the same functionality as the iPhone edition where you can view all possible hotspots. Also, like many others, the achievements are broken where it randomly disconnects from the Google Play service.
Not good for phone. Refresh rate too slow.
Did not run
good game , nice work
no longer works on pixel3a
great game!
poorly done swip controls dont work well and very hard to navigate. was in high hope after playing myst but this is a let down. would like refund. as it is unplayable as it is.

The greatest puzzle game ever created, and one of the greatest games of all time. This port is good, but not great. I hit a bug during the marble puzzle - the culmination of the entire game - and was unable to continue. I commend those who put in the effort to preserve this game, but I would love to see a true resoration - a full 4 - 8K re-rendering of every pannel. This game (along with Myst) deserve to be played for generations to come.
Riven ..The sequel on my phone brings back wonderful memories.This game is mazing everything is as I remember it.. Thank you.

Awesome to be able to play such a classic game on my phone! I had a blast solving the puzzles and enjoying the story originally made by the Cyan team. The only problem I had was the Fire Marble puzzle, it had a glitch to where I could only see 3 of the 6 marbles when I was standing over the puzzle but once I took a step back I could barely see all of them and was able to semi blindly place them in the correct spots. Other than that this was an excellent reproduction and I really appreciate it!
Played through the whole game, works great, thank you

I played Realmyst with my daughter and loved it. After we were done, we were ready to play Riven. It was exciting when it started like the ending of Realmyst. But it soo boring, we lost interest within the first 10 minutes. The controllers are hard, the graphics are ok. It seems like they made this game in hurry not like Realmyst. My daughters didn't want to play it anymore. We are disappointed.

This is a truly excellent transfer of the most graphically advanced game of 1997. Now for the complaints:. 1) the puzzles are hard. Before writing a 2 star review Matt Tudor try routing the steam power to the gangway. 2) Realmyst was much later version of myst allowing freedom of movement. Unfortunately Cyan never made a 'real' Riven. so whinging that old games aren't as graphically advanced as 2019 ones is pointless.
This version of Riven is unbeatable due to missing marbles in the fire marble puzzle.
I am having the same issue as matt tudor the pellet puzzle definitely has a bug and is impossible to progress
Excellent
Tried 4 times to install. Gets to 700-850mb and just hangs. Waste of money, internet data and time. Tripled annoyance factor, since i bought the game like 20 years ago
Couldn't get past the splash screen
Took my money and keeps freezing on install. Not happy
I get to the part where you put these knobs and places like dicks whatever you want to call it where move the control lever all but 1 on the side then you put them in place I'm not saying we didn't

The controls render this game unplayable. I don't have time to tap my screen 50,000 times trying to find that one magic spot that will allow me to move. After playing realmyst I expected more out of noodle cake. Huge disappointment. Refunded and uninstalled.
i just downloaded this thinking to enjoy some Riven quality. boy was i disappointed when ot took 5 hours to load and i could not click anywhere.
Loved it,hoping y'all will remake the rest of the Myst games
sometimes the game doesn't work as it should on the Blade X.
always fun to play üòâ not easy - entertainting
Well, it keeps crashing and wont open. So, it cant be that good.
The game will not load past the splash screen. I have a Pixel 2. Edit: It got past the splash screen on my Pixelbook.
works with pi, you might think there's a bug but its probably because your not doing it right! Lots of things that are not obvious at first glance, good game!

Gutted! need to be able to move and navigate like you can in realmyst, this is just a nightmare. lazy game development, might have been good for a PC but on mobile it is virtually unplayable. ... shame...
Loved the original, enjoyed this just as much. From a time long ago when puzzles were really hard, and so much more rewarding when solved. Please, please port more of the series to android!
can not be installed on chome os
Very difficult. Still great though.
used to play this when i was younger so loved both games keep up good work

The controls are not great. More importantly, the game broke halfway through on my configuration, and I could not find any way to fix it. But the creator gave great customer service: they offered a refund even after the usual refund term.
Freezes at the title screen every time I open the game on my lg g7 one. I'll happily rate this game 5 stars if this is fixed.

The one-star rating is because of the bug in the colored marble puzzle; only three of the marbles can be seen while you are up close on the puzzle, and you have to try to grab and place them blind - which is nearly impossible. This bug is unconscionable for a paid app, as it severely hinders gameplay and essentially makes it impossible to finish the game. Please fix it, and I'll be happy to change to a 5-star rating for a fantastic game! Google Pixel users, look for a PC version instead.
not immersive like the first noodlecake myst game
Primitive. Poor control on Pixel-C.
do not purchase... game will fail to install. developers have abandoned the project; last update over a year ago... real myst , however, works.
Masterpiece. Thank you Cyan <3
I too have been waiting for this game...I used to play on my computer... Years ago..I'm so excited to play!!!! Best games Ever Myst and Riven!!! üòÜüòÜüòÜ

Can't get past the part where you have to put a pellet on the trap. I can pick up the pellet, but it won't let me place it anywhere, I drag it over the trap (where I'm sure it's supposed to go, it's bait) and when I lift my finger, the pellet disappears. Definitely feels like a bug, please let me know when it's fixed
Fantastic!!!!

I absolutely loved playing this game again as I did in my youth, nothing is straightforward to solve & some puzzles truly perplexed my mind. Please, please bring back more of the series for me to play!!!
All I saw was a blank screen and the UI after waiting like 10 minuets to "extract" to 100% whatever that means.... Is there more to this than what meets the eye? Idk.

Fantastic game. Only issue is the achiements appear to be broken or I am missing something. I am unable to get any of them completed. They are just too much. Also one of them appears to be broken since I have linked every possible way but cannot get past 87%
Love the originals. Hope cyan Inc. Is making money off these android ports.
My dad bought me the game when I was younger, unfortunately the windows 95 was updated and could no longer run it.
Doesn't even run on a Note 9.

After playing The Room this was like going back in time to the Hobbit on my 
old ZX Spectrum. Don't pay for it unless you're after a bit of nostalgia 
and fancy seeing what games used to be like when your daddy was a boy

I was finally able to finish this game. Riven is still a really good game, 
though still really difficult. I had a lot of technical issues with this 
port though. I had to completely reinstall the game and replay from start 3 
times because the game was locked. Also, the fire marble puzzle was bugged 
for me by not showing all the marbles. This made an already difficult 
puzzle impossible, since I was running around trying to find where the 
other marbles were!

So everything was working great. Until I got to the part where you are in 
the jail cell and click the linking book. Then it just ends. I dont know if 
its something I'm doing wrong but it wont work after that. I would like a 
refund.

This game is almost impossible to download.. It is extremely large and I 
hVe made over 7 attempts to download.. It does OK until it reaches the 
extended file.. I tried to refund the game but the refund option is no 
longer optional.. Very disappointed! I want my money refunded! Buyers.. 
Beware of this problem!

I had absolutely zero problems with the controls or glitchy issues. I grew 
up playing the Myst games, and I absolutely love them! This was an awesome 
experience, and I highly recommend this to anybody, whether you are a Myst 
fan like me, or if you are just looking for a fun puzzle game to pass the 
time with. My only question to Noodlecake Studios is are you planning on 
making Myst 3: Exile?

Great game. Sure its not 3d like Real Myst. But i do enjoy the older style 
better. Would love to see other Cyan studio games on the Android platform.

This a really good port... when it doesn't crash. There are a few key 
moments where the game ALWAYS crashes, rendering it unfinishable. I cannot 
access the large golden dome from the island with Ghent's office (crashes 
when I try to cross the bridge), and I cannot link back to Riven from the 
secret hideout (crashes when I click the linking book back to Riven). The 
parts I can play are enjoyable, but the bugs are game-breaking. I kind of 
expect that the developer should offer a refund, but what I'd really prefer 
is for the bugs to get fixed. Played on a Samsung Galaxy s9.

I was excited to see this in the Play store as I loved Myst but had never 
gotten to play Riven on PC. This port is terrible. The controls are 
extremely temperamental and the game crashes at the same spot every time 
allowing no progress. I'm playing on a Samsung S8, not a particularly old 
phone. Looks like these issues have been around for quite some and no one 
has addressed them.

I was expecting this to be a fully 3d rendition of riven such as its 
android prequel. As such I was let down. it's pretty pricey for a point and 
click adventure. I've never played Riven on PC before so If I really get 
into it I might give more stars.
App does not work you have to call to get your money refunded
Oldskool Myst fan. Thanks for being there, Cyan.

Riven lacks the smooth movement and control that made RealMyst so fun to 
play and better than the original. I loved this game way back when on my PC 
but was never a fan of the choppy movement. As soon as I realized it was 
going to be the same I uninstalled it. Bummer.
Played it once never worked again

This would easily be a five star glowing review if I could get past the 
consistent "error 202" screen I get past 10% at the extraction of files. 
There is more than enough free space on my device.

Giving 5 stars because I love the original game and I want to see continued 
development on this port. There are some bugs and animations seem to 
stutter, but it's playable for sure. PS, if you like this game or others in 
the Myst franchise, please back the 25th anniversary kickstarter! You can 
have your own working linking book with all the games. Thank you for 
bringing this to mobile! - Teni'shan

Just finished the game on my Android tablet. (Originally only completed 
about half the game when it came out on PS1 many years ago). I was very 
impressed with this port. It played almost flawlessly and I was reminded 
why this game has so many die-hard fans. The story reaches an absorbing 
climax that is hard to forget!

I get an Error 202 when launching the game. I have 37GB free space. 
Uninstall/reinstall doesn't fix it. I'm on Nexus 6P.

We are having a problem reading Cathetine's journal for the D'ni code for 
the man hole at the end of the game which is required each game has a 
different code in the journal every new game. The journals disappear in the 
inventory never to be seen again. Either you have Atrus's journal or you 
have no journals at all. It needs to be fixed. Also this app is not 
compatible with LG Stylio 3. But the RealMyst is compatible. Thanks for 
paying attention.

Couldn't see the bait in the trap. Other than that it's a wonderful game. I 
love when I have to take notes!
I downloaded this game but it didn't work couldn't do anything.would like my money back please
replyContent: HI Evelyn, please contact us at support@noodlecake.com for help with refunds.

content: Great game, horrible port. The game won't auto rotate, and it doesn't keep the screen Brigh/awake. Looks like the Development has been abandoned
very glitchy, riven deserves a working port.
it keeps crashing during the transition between islands. galaxy s8 been trying to contact the developer, but they can't be bothered to reply. I'll never buy anything from noodlecake again.
Great game
The game is basically impossible to finish because of a glitch which renders three of the fire marbles invisible.

Extremely buggy and glitchy. The videos' quality was terribly poor. The app sometimes froze and I had to force quit and restart it. The books on some point disappeared from my inventory and they reappeared randomly. In the marble puzzle due to a frustrating glitch, some of the marbles are not being shown, even though they are there (if you take a step back you will see them) and took me something like 3 hours of grinding to complete it despite of knowing the answer. Overall I had some goosebumps due to the nostalgia factor but this remastering is just bad and does not worth the money.
Can't say enough

I tried contacting the developer for this app in the past and had provided videos of certain things in the game, like certain sounds that are either cut out or not there at all. The developer did nothing about it at all. And still to this date has yet to be fixed. I just don't understand why cyan would of even gave this developer access to create an android version of their game. I mean look at all their other apps, they're all baby type games. So if this developer can't even create a decent game of their own, then how the hell can cyan think this developer is the one to choose. In my opinion I think it's all about money. They probably don't even have any money in the first place, so they find this cheap ass dumb developer to make an android version of their game. And then as soon as they get money from people, they more less just treat you like your nothing. While they sit on a big pile of cash. Everyone has their own opinion and in mine, I think this developer is a piece of trash!

After install, Google Play security reports there is a virus in this game.  What gives?  I opted to delete the infected file, but this could have a negative impact at some point in the game and cause an abrupt application failure.
Awsome
Unable to play due to constant lock ups and restarts
There are no adventure games out there that even come close in comparison to Myst games! Absolutely wonderous!!

Finally got to finish this game. Had it for PC way back when it first released. Never finished it most likely because of 6 discs that were needed to be swapped over and over while running it.  I was able to fly through the entire game in just a few hours on this platform.  The end was disappointingly uneventful. But worth the price for finally completing it.

Played it during my childhood, it is still amazing, visually and thematically. The world tells a story, and you must immerse yourself in Rivens culture to solve the more difficult puzzles. The soundtrack is still one of the greatest of all time.
One of my favorite point and clicks. Noticeably buggy but functional. Anyone know how to load a game?

After purchasing realMyst I was expecting more. This is lacking everything that makes these games so great, its not atmospheric at all, and you dont feel immersed. I was disappointed but I guess thats why its cheaper than realMyst

I am a massive fan of the mist franchise, Anyone that is into intensely atmospheric puzzle games should definitely play them. The problem is this port seems to crash whenever I go to a new island (when the game would have required you to change disks). The game continued to crash untill it would not open again. I will be happy to change my rating if this bug gets fixed.
Crashes on Note 8

I was very hopeful to get to play one of my all time favorite games. Was very excited to see this game on the play store. Bought it immediately, removed other apps and files to install, only to have it not run at all. No response to crash reports or requests for support- didn't ask for a refund because I so badly still wanted to play. It's sad to see a developer use such a great title just to take money from people

Doesn't work. After waiting about 5 minutes for it to download and extract extra resources, it then told me I didn't have enough space on my phone. I have 16 GB free if that's not enough than the game should tell you before you buy it. Meanwhile, I have contacted Noodlecake THREE times over more than a week. They have not responded even once. Then, after finally responding 2 weeks later and throwing a hissy fit over my complaints, they asked if I wanted their help in updating (as if it was my fault) or a refund. I said Refund. That was over a  month ago. They have not responded at all during that time. There is simply no reason for an app, especially a paid app, to not have the FULL DOWNLOAD in the actual install. This is not a physical media game that you might sell the disc and then later have updates. This is something that can and should be updated in Google Play BEFORE you download it. You don't take someone's money only to have them find out that there is a huge update that they may not have room on their phones for, or, in my case, that they have plenty of room for, but the updater doesn't work. But that is the key point there. They want to make sure they get your money.

Plays very close to the original win95 version. Couple minor things were some puzzles needing a bit more precision for a small phone screen and cutscenes can be too easily skipped by just tapping the screen.  However,  everything else plays basically the same. For $4 and not having to swap between 5 CDs, worth it!  Thank you!
Extremely buggy to the point that it quits to the launcher, rendering the game unable to be finished.  Every time I try to get back to dome islandi get kicked out.
It's riven for crying out loud!  It's impossible not to like it. Ok, it has a few glitches here and there but hey, you can live with it. Awesome!
This is great, glad this game was added to mobile devices. Is Myst:Exile coming soon, been wanting to play that again.
Awesome game! Downloaded yesterday and recieved messages from McAfee that two files from the game were threats? First ever on my phone. Just wondering! Not computer literate!

A shame that there are so many bugs. It's a great port apart from the fact it's unfinishble: for me the purple and orange marbles on top of the dome do not appear on screen. From a distance they're there and you can guess where to move them but the invisible ones jump from under the finger like the visible ones do.
I bought the game but it won't download.  What a waste.
Amazing sequel to the classic game. Highly recommended!

Amazing to play this game on a phone after all these years but it's too buggy and can't be finished. Works up until the marble puzzle but only three marbles are visible. You can actually move all of them and if you step back they're all visible but it's impossible to line them up correctly. Videos are glitchy and as other reviewers mentioned some background animations are missing.
Game looks great and is so fun. That said, using the journal or inventory can be difficult. Still, i never finished riven as a kid and now i can on my tablet! Love it.

I would love to rate this app higher but my phone(which is a Samsung galaxy s8+ on verizon) will go to download and then it will get to the end then it will cycle through to download again. Once it does download it will open and start saying extracting but when it gets to 10% it says error 202 make sure there is enough space for the game. Well I have 36 gb open and ready to use. Please fix so I can enjoy my purchase.

Shuddup and take my money! Been waiting for this one for a while now! Plays great so far on my tablet. It's probably too big but remaining hopeful we'll get III: Exile at some point. Loved Brad Duriff's acting in it xD Update: Played through entire game with all possible endings. Plays better than it ever did on my pc with the original Cd lol. CHANGE NOTHING it's perfect!
Thankyou so much for bringing this to mobile. Very well done. And didnt go trying to change things. I feel like im home again

Would live a refund for error 459 failure to install It might be playstore.Most trusted developers give you a grace period to uninstall for a refund. With so many TOP END DEVICES having issues I doubt the negative reviews are not all just people with inadequate hardware.

Hudl 2 - Superb! I dearly hope we can have Myst 3 - Exile, the music alone was sublime. Many, many thanks to the team that made it possible, whilst faithful to the original. (Wonder how big Exile would be, I'd still make room for it, can always reload the old faithfuls after.)

I've played riven on multiple platforms but there is a bug that prevents me from continuing. The large fire marble dome is missing the yellow marble so I can't activate the dome. This is incredibly disappointing. I've seen multiple reviews with various bugs. Give us an update to this game, we paid you for this, we expect the full game.
Never grew up with riven but its so nice to finally go back and play it. Hope to see more games by cyan worlds on here. Defiantly plan on picking up anything myst related.

I have a 300 Mbs connection, but the server where the Riven app is located seriously needs updating. At thedownload rate I am actually seeing, 1.27 GB will take 2.1 hours to download from the obviously slow server. This is quite unacceptable.  Update,  Google must have fixed their servers.  After trying to download Riven over three days,  always timing out at around 40% progress,  it finally downloaded in about one minute.
replyContent: Hey, just to clarify we have zero control over the downloading of the game. Sounds like you're having problems with Google Play Store not with the game. Please contact Google Play support for help with downloading issues.

content: Has a bug in the stones puzzle. Some stones are missing.
It constantly and inconsistently crashes with no warning. Great game, terrible performance.
Security breach
Thank you for the chance to play Myst and Riven again, I love these games... hope to see the rest of them for Android in the future.
Retro

I loved the original game when it was released for PC, and this is an excellent reproduction. The controls translate well onto the touch interface, and the graphiucs hold up really well. The only major complaints I have are the amount of space the game took up on my device (1.2GB!) and that some of the achievements didn't appear to work. Otherwise, it's an excellent title and worth the purchase.

Kept telling me I needed more space on my SD card to run, but really wanted me to clear an additional 1.2GB on my tablet before it could open, for a total of 2.4GB. Too bad, I was looking forward to playing, but I can't clear that much storage for one game.
NOT COMPATABLE WITH ALL DEVICES. Google Play says it is but they are mistaken. I suspect Noodlecake Studios far understates their requirments to sell more games. Beware this vendor!

The opening video is a neon green screen with purple highlights, and once the first gate is open it is frozen indefinitely. It was such a wonderful game on my PC, but this is disappointing on Android. Hoping for an update to fix it since it was not cheap
Error, extraction failed due to not having enough space. I have 70gb+ space free!!!!

There are insurmountable bugs within game. There are two area transitions that kick me out of the game. 1. Mine cart return journey from factory island to village island. After vid plays, and cart has arrived, kicked out to phone screen. 2. Walking from Gehn's lab, across walkway, back to temple island. When I lower bridge to walk into done, I can't. The step into dome kicks me out to phone screen. The transition from one game area to another needs to be more robust. The only solution currently is a 1GB reinstall, losing all game play progress.

Everything is bad, sadly. I loved realMyst, but this game is far from it. The controls are what sucks most. In realMyst, you could move free and go anywhere you wanted. In this game I have to tap to places where I want to go, and can't go or turn around gradually as I could in realMyst. That makes the game unplayable. Uninstalled after a few minutes of suffering, and advice everybody not to install it if you expect the same gameplay realMyst offered. Also the graphics looks very poorly on QHD screen. After amazing hours of fun with realMyst, this is really just a huge disappointment.
Loved this game but you need a phone with more that 16gb of memory or no other apps installed.
Verizon Security & Protection App flags this as Stagefright exploit malware. Emailed support and no response.  After waiting I ended up uninstalling it. üôÅ
Unable to confront Gehn despite having the correct solution to the fire marble puzzle and the domes unlocked. I get a black screen in the linking books using Android TV (Sony XBR-55X700D)
I played MYST when it was first released. I'm glad that noodlecake brought them back so I could enjoy them all over again. Thanks.
Love these games! Played great on my tablet .. would love for the other ones to be made to be played on my tablet too.
Best. Game. Ever.
This game tested positive for malware & viruses using McAfee on my tablet. I didn't pay for this to buy a load of malware!

Was loving it for the first twenty minutes or so, then I rode a rollercoaster... Crashes every time at the end. Tried a different route, made it to another island - the rollercoaster that dumps you automatically - but now can't get off that island because it crashes after the rollercoaster ride getting off. Want so much to love what appears to be a faithful port, just too unstable to be any fun.
It will not work on m tablet. I can hear it but my screen is totally black. I tryed unistalling and reinstalling it three times.

You should include the information that move to SD works after the first start after extracting the game. And add the warning that you need to have ca. 2.7gb free so that extracting works. After that you have ca. 1.2gb more memory left.
Begins to extract content then stops between 5-10% saying its out of space; although I have extended storage with 256gb usb 3.0 flash on nvidia shield TV 2017. Please fix
Verizon Security and Privacy reports that the app is infected with a Stagefright exploit.

Played the PC version of this game and it is amazing! This mobile port crashes immediately when I start it from my SD card which is the only place I have room for it. Had to manually move it there via App Settings since it doesn't install on the card by default. I will update my review once I get it to work. I sent the devs a crash report so hopefully they will be able to fix the issue. This game is great if you can get it to work!

The still frames are beautiful. Unfortunately it doesn't look like the videos were enhanced enough. The change in quality sort of brings you out of the experience. I know it's an old game and played it when it first came out on PC. But I was hoping for all the renders to be updated. There's the problem with the screen timing out. Otherwise it's still an amazing game. The story and gameplay still stand up to the best available for mobile. So glad that Riven and Myst are now on Android.
I would to see the other Myst Games converted to run on my tablet.
All in all a good game with great graphics.  My problem is activating the domes.  Even after placing the marbles correctly in the press, the domes don't activate.  What am I doing wrong?

When I get out of the mini-sub and pull the lever at the teepee, the rope swing comes down but it won't let me get on. It just starts going back up on its own. I've played riven numerous times so I know what it's supposed to do. Now I can't finish the game. Not sure what to do. Playing this on my note 5.

It's an overall good port of a fantastic classic game, but there are a few small things that should be fixed, for instance, the screen will timeout if you're not touching it periodically. For a game where note-taking is essential, this is a bit annoying. Still, the old graphics and cinematics are stunning even today, and the strange and beautiful worlds of Riven are just as immersive on the small screen as they were on the computer!
At last!
Riven is my favorite game in whole world...
Awesome! Works perfectly fine! Reliving my childhood
Overall so realistic.loved it.

Absolutely pissed off i wasted money on this. Then again if i had of played it before i played the room 1,2 and 3 games i might of thought it was good. 4.99 down the drain, think ill replay the room games which i would pay 10.00 euro for each one no problem they are that good

I adore all the Myst games and Riven has to be my favorite. I was really excited to see it available in the Play store but sadly all I get when running it is sound but a black screen. Maybe its because my Toshiba AT300 runs a Tegra chip set but it would be awesome if this could be fixed in a future update.

Great job on bringing this beloved sequel to Android. Well, worth the wait! Controls were a bit challenging but that's to be expected with small screens. Zoom feature perhaps would make difference between 4 and 5 stars. So, Uru? :D

Well, it would be so much better if every time a cinematic would come up, the entire screen glitches and becomes distorted. I have to skip every cinematic in order to continue. This makes it so i can't hear the noise of the creatures and i can't see the symbols on any of the eyes so there isn't a way for me to achieve the sequences. Therefore, the game cannot be completed. I'm kind of disappointed, I was really excited to play this game again and it just didn't work. If noodle cake would help me out, that would be great but, until then, this game just won't work and leaves me completely useless in the game.

Something is going on I have downloaded this game 3 times and it won't leave an icon or something on my phone to play the game. I have paid for it but can't play  my phone is a galaxy s8 so I think it would work with this phone I'm not sure what to do at this point..
Great with Note 3! (and probably any phone with a big screen and a stylus)
Crashes too often... Bugs left and right, choppy video, silence from the devs, clearly when it comes to bugs; the ending has not yet been written
Great remaster of a classic, look forward to the sequels!

I cannot get the game to open because it took too much data so I deleted everything off my phone. I just got this phone so it wasn't a big deal. I was looking forward to playing this game and I couldn't. I would very much like my money back.

Wonderful to be able to play this again, and looks like a very faithful port.  Unfortunately crashes straight after the rollercoaster ride and is thus unplayable. Eagerly awaiting a fix. Update 13/5: still crashing despite reinstall. No contact from developer despite feedback.

Love the game but it keeps crashing on the rail car. Doesn't matter which one I'm on, I can't get out at the destination without it closing. If I allow the storage permission, it won't open at all.  Update 5-9-17.... Have yet to hear back from the developer via this review or email. Still cannot play any further due to the game crashing.
Pure nostalgic joy. Great work!
Played it once and when I went to play a second time it just kept crashing on start up. Very frustrating, please fix ASAP!
Incredible game!

Just completed it! Great game, from a Myst series fan, this is probably my favorite , and super thrilled to see it emerge onto android! The game runs well albeit a few minor errors. It can be challenging tapping or dragging things along at times especially when it's the fine details. Such as putting the code in the gold globes or the fissure telescope for example. But otherwise it runs beautifully , congrats!

Finally after thirteen long Years trying to emulate this on a emulator I have something that works just like the original game however their was a Corrupted Ram value that made on my books disappear Had to Start a new game to get my books value back  only took like an hour the back Track Did the readers I recommend if your books disappear  use your bookmark To fix the problem before you have to make a new game Not a real problem after you discovered the donee number system youre pretty much good to go to beating the game.

MYST and this game moreso, like a thousand fold, was one of the best games of my childhood.  I became utterly enthralled with the mystery, the music, the world, the numbering system... All of it.  Its hauntingly beautiful, and if you ever loved any of the myst games, i feel this is the absolute pinnacle.  If you don't treat yourself, you're missing out.
Love it are you going to do the reast of the myst games
I bought this App, but it won't download...I've tried four times already!!!!
Awesome simply great
One of my favorite games of all time!!
Brilliant! Plays perfectly - no bugs yet. Playing in a Nexus 6p. Thanks so much for this port! Now for Myst 3, 4 and 5!

Thanks Noodlecake! Works wonderfully since the fix. Loved it on the PC... Love it even more on mobile. Kudos to a job well done!  Same issue as others, stopped working even after reboot. Droid Turbo Android 6.0.1 Will update review of fixed.
replyContent: Hey JC, the update should resolve this. Consider doing a full uninstall/reinstall. If you have any further issues contact support@noodlecake.com Thanks!

replyContent: Hey Sean, the update should resolve this. Consider doing a full uninstall/reinstall. If you have any further issues contact support@noodlecake.com Thanks!

content: Managed to complete the game in two hours-long sessions. This version seems even more stable than the Steam release; it didn't crash once for me. All the sounds I remember are present, though some seem truncated. Some animations have fewer frames than the original, but I assume that's a space-saving trade-off. The best part was being able to pair up my Bluetooth mouse and use that for control. It was just like playing on the PC, except for not having to swap disks after using transportation.

Played on a Galaxy Note 5 running 7.0 Nougat and using a Moga Pro controller in HID (B) mode. Everything seems to work just fine. The $3.99 price point is definitely an excellent value! I'm looking forward to playing it more once I get home later tonight. Looking forward too to playing it on my Galaxy View 18.4"Tablet running 5.1.1. Thanks guys for bring this to Android so soon after the RealMyst release, Iü§îfigured it would be a longer time period if at all. Nice jobüòÅ
The best of the Myst series on my phone! What's not to love?

UPDATE: finally installed, and it's beautiful!  Won't finish installation on N5. RealMyst installed and ran beautifully. This downloads and begins installation, but after several minutes saying "installing" it crashes and reboots the system. Going to try on my tablet and may revise rating, but so far it's been a waste of money.
replyContent: Hey Jeff, Riven's a huge app. Unfortunately we have no control of the installation phase - that's controlled by Google Play and the Android OS. We're not sure how to help you here and we recommend you contact Google support.

content: The update fixed the crashing bug. Perfect port of one of my all time favorite games.   Now....to remember how to solve that animal puzzle again...

Just started getting into the game and goes off says google play has stopped but i emailed them within minutes they emailed back very impressed with there support team as got update and fixed game now addicted like the original game its so gooooooodddddd
replyContent: Hey there! Can you try update the game and play it again? I think we fixed the problem for you. If you experience anything else please contact support@Noodlecake.com

content: I love that Riven is now ported to Android. This was always my favorite of the Myst series. Thanks to Noodlecake and Cyan for bringing realMyst and Riven back again.

Update fixed crash. Love! Please re-review, all who experienced this problem, I want more of my favorite games ported to Android! Also, I know it's probably near impossible with this game, but I so enjoyed being able to look everywhere in realmyst.
replyContent: Hey Nicholas, the update should resolve this. Consider doing a full uninstall/reinstall. If you have any further issues contact support@noodlecake.com Thanks!

content: Appears to be a really solid port of a classic game. Movement is smooth, and the graphics appear to be faithful to the original.   Never finished this when it was first released, but I'm looking forward to experiencing it now!
replyContent: Thanks Joel! We had a small bug when achievements were earned and it would crash but that is all fixed now. Let us know how the experience goes!

Some issues with it force closing after the roller coaster initially, but since their update, and uninstalling and reinstalling, the issue is now resolved, and the game playable! Woohoo!!!
